channel.title: Help urgent
channel.description:
How do I change a skills name?
I've changed the farming icon to a skull for a PVP Skill , when I kill someone I get 25k exp on PVP and when I level up it says
"Congratulations you have advanced a PVP skill" "Your PVP Skill is now level (level)"
But when I put my mouse on top of the skull icon on the skills tab it shows
"Farming Exp - 25000" "Exp until next level - 39400"
How do I change it so that it says
"PVP Exp - 2500" "Exo until next level - 39400"
Thanks if your going to help

item.title: Help urgent
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

item.title: Help urgent

item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

I’ve changed the farming icon to a skull for a PVP Skill , when I kill someone I get 25k exp on PVP and when I level up it says

“Your PVP Skill is now level (level)”

“Exo until next level - 39400”
